summary: Experienced Full Stack Software Engineer with extensive expertise in JavaScript design patterns and comprehensive software architecture. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions from initial proof-of-concept development to large-scale enterprise applications, with demonstrated ability to scale production systems and meticulous attention to detail throughout the entire development lifecycle.

workExperience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Founding engineer for Yunex Traffic GmbH, a Siemens Mobility spin-off that was successfully acquired by Atlantia in 2022
Architected and developed next-generation traffic management systems for smart cities across Europe
Led the development of real-time traffic optimization algorithms using machine learning and IoT sensor data
Built scalable microservices infrastructure handling 10M+ daily traffic events for urban mobility solutions
Designed and implemented cloud-native platforms for intelligent transportation systems (ITS)
Collaborated with city planners and traffic engineers to deliver data-driven mobility solutions
workExperience.technologies: Javascript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, Python, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, IoT, Machine Learning

workExperience.title: Full Stack Engineer
